customer_reviews.title: works great but for some reason contains lead
customer_reviews.text: As part of a lead review of our home we found that my laptop cool pad is 32ppm lead. The technician used an XRF test gun, so I think the results are valid. He shot it through the palm rest. My blood lead level is less than.3 mcg/dL and this cool pad, if inhaled, would elevate blood lead levels to .4 mcg/dL. So not a big deal, since it is just skin contact, but still, just so everyone knows it has a surprisingly high lead content. The tech said they use lead as a release agent in the plastic molding and as a UV resistant.

customer_reviews.title: Use on FLAT SURFACE ONLY
customer_reviews.text: You must use these on a FLAT SURFACE ONLY. It wouldn't take much for this company to add a screen cover on the blade housing to keep this from happening. You definitely cannot use it on a blanket, like laying in bed, etc. Fortunately they are cheap.

product_meta.title: Belkin F5L001-BLK Laptop Cooling Pad (Black)
product_meta.description:
Belkin Laptop Cooling Pad

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Keep your lap and your computer cool with the Belkin Laptop Cooling Pad. The Cooling Pad helps prevent laptop overheating with a high-capacity fan and a patented wave design that enhances its cooling capabilities. Powered via USB, the pad features a portable, collapsible design that promotes low power consumption and doesn't require bulky power adapters. In addition to keeping your computer cool, the Belkin Laptop Cooling Pad also brings your laptop closer to eye level, helping to reduce strain on your neck and wrist and improving your general computing experience.



High-Capacity Fan for Cool, Comfortable Computing
With its high-capacity fan, the Belkin Laptop Cooling Pad actively dissipates heat by blowing air directly on the bottom of your laptop. Its patented wave design promotes natural convection, consistently moving the airflow up and away from the machine. This efficient solution keeps both your laptop and your lap from getting too hot. And to make sure that your laptop stays secure on your lap, the Cooling Pad features grip pads on its surface.

USB Powered for Energy Efficiency and Portability
The Belkin Laptop Cooling Pad is powered by a USB port on your computer, offering low power consumption with no bulky adapters required. You can take it with you on the daily commute without having to worry about finding a power outlet. 

Improves Viewing and Typing Comfort
By adding a few inches to your laptop's screen height, this cooling pad helps reduce neck strain commonly associated with laptop use. The pad's gentle slope also improves typing comfort by reducing wrist strain. 

Convenient, Portable Design
The Belkin Cooling Pad can be collapsed to fit conveniently inside most laptop bags for easy transport. A convenient storage compartment holds the USB power cable when it's not in use. 

The Belkin Laptop Cooling Pad is backed by a limited lifetime warranty.

What's in the Box
Belkin Laptop Cooling Pad, USB cable, and instructions.
